rows.label: tlk43310142_02_msg0001
rows.name:
The gate leading to the Karam
Ruins, the Holy Gate of Fontana,
has been forced open.

rows.label: tlk43310142_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Some sources claim it was the work of
Iira, but there's no trace of them to
be found, so it's difficult to say.

rows.label: tlk43310142_02_msg0003
rows.name:
We also found some severe damage
to the Karam Ruins themselves.

rows.label: tlk43310142_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Some people are even saying they saw the
Holy Grail around. We'll have to boost
Fons Maim's security, that's for sure...

rows.label: tlk43310142_02_msg0005
rows.name:
If you see anyone suspicious,
be sure to report them to
the Invidian Army.
